name: com.unity.2d.animation
description: 2D Animation provides all the necessary tooling and runtime components for skeletal animation using Sprites.

samples.description: Various 2D Animation sample scenes to show different usage of the 2D Animation tooling for various outcomes.

_upm.changelog:
### Added
- Support for automatic weight generation in the Skinning Editor for ARM64 editors. (case DANB-550)

### Fixed
- Sprite Resolver previews not visible after editor regained focus. (case DANB-565)
- Sprite Skin is not deformed in the Editor after exiting the playmode if the domain reload is disabled. (case DANB-573)
